Skills & Expertise

I have extensive experience in full-stack development, cybersecurity, and cloud infrastructure. My technical stack includes React, Node.js, Python, and various cybersecurity tools.

I'm proficient in both frontend and backend technologies, with a strong focus on creating secure and scalable applications that meet modern business requirements.

{/* Sección 3 */}

Philosophy

I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and following best practices in software development. Continuous learning and adaptation are at the core of my professional philosophy.

When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.
